EmailTemplate.name: Notify Sales on SSO Creation
EmailTemplate.subject: Request for Sold Sign Off Available - {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.DBA__c} {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Email_employer_Type__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
The Sold Sign Off: {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Name} has been created for {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Account__c}/DBA: {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.DBA__c}, {!Sold_Sign_Off__c.Email_employer_Type__c}.
Before submitting for approval - Please update: • Additional fields • Plan selections (if necessary) • Add Plan Rates with the necessary Tiers & Groupings
Thank you.
